verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he is devising a plan to withhold aid from the home countries of immigrants who illegally enter the U.S.]
President Donald Trump said he [V: is] devising a plan to withhold aid from the home countries of immigrants who illegally enter the U.S.
President Donald Trump said [ARG0: he] is [V: devising] [ARG1: a plan to withhold aid from the home countries of immigrants who illegally enter the U.S.]
President Donald Trump said he is devising a plan to [V: withhold] [ARG1: aid] [ARG2: from the home countries of immigrants who illegally enter the U.S.]
President Donald Trump said he is devising a plan to withhold aid from the home countries of [ARG0: immigrants] [R-ARG0: who] [ARGM-MNR: illegally] [V: enter] [ARG1: the U.S.]
